Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotelapplication.backend.ReservationManager
  • public class ReservationManager
extends Object
    The ReservationManager class provides static utility methods for managing hotel reservations. This includes creating, modifying, canceling reservations, assigning users, and performing various related calculations.
    Author:
    Ethan Mojahedi

    • Method Summary

      • createReservation

        public static Reservation createReservation​(int userID,
                                            int roomID,
                                            LocalDate startDate,
                                            LocalDate endDate)
        Creates a new reservation and updates associated entities such as the hotel, user, room, and the database.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user ID of the user making the reservation.
        roomID - The room ID of the room being reserved.
        startDate - The start date of the reservation.
        endDate - The end date of the reservation.
        Returns:
        The created Reservation object.

        public static void assignUser​(User user,
                              Reservation reservation)
        Assigns a user to a reservation by creating a new reservation with the updated user and replacing the old reservation in the hotel and user records.
        Parameters:
        user - The new user to be assigned to the reservation.
        reservation - The existing reservation to be updated.

        Returns:

      • isValidDate

        public static boolean isValidDate​(String date)
        Validates whether a given date string (format: YYYY/MM/DD) is a valid and future date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date string to validate.
        Returns:
        true if the date is valid and in the future; false otherwise.

      • cleanupExpiredReservations

        public static void cleanupExpiredReservations​(Hotel hotel)
        Cleans up expired reservations in the hotel system. This method iterates through all reservations in the hotel and identifies those with an end date before the current date. It removes these expired reservations from the user's reservation list and the room's reservation list, leaving the reservation only stored in the hotel's records for archival purposes.
        Parameters:
        hotel - The hotel object containing reservations and associated data.

      • getReservation

        public static Reservation getReservation​(int reservationID)
        Get a reservation from list of reservations.
        Parameters:
        reservationID - The ID of the reservation we want.
        Returns:
        The Reservation object.

      • filterRooms

        public static ArrayList<Room> filterRooms​(ArrayList<Room> rooms,
                                          int roomSize,
                                          Hotel hotel,
                                          LocalDate startDate,
                                          LocalDate endDate)
        Filters a list of rooms by size and availability.
        Parameters:
        rooms - The list of rooms to filter.
        roomSize - The desired number of beds.
        hotel - The hotel where the rooms are located.
        startDate - The start date of the desired reservation.
        endDate - The end date of the desired reservation.
        Returns:
        A list of rooms matching the criteria.

      • filterRooms

        public static ArrayList<Room> filterRooms​(ArrayList<Room> rooms,
                                          Integer numOfBeds,
                                          String bedType,
                                          Calendar startDate,
                                          Calendar endDate)
        Filters a list of rooms by size and availability.
        Parameters:
        rooms - The list of rooms to filter.
        roomSize - The desired number of beds.
        hotel - The hotel where the rooms are located.
        startDate - The start date of the desired reservation.
        endDate - The end date of the desired reservation.
        Returns:
        A list of rooms matching the criteria.

                                        int roomNumber)
        Finds and returns a room from a list of rooms based on its room number.
        Parameters:
        rooms - The list of rooms to search through.
        roomNumber - The room number to search for.
        Returns:
        The Room object with the specified room number, or null if not found.
